metadata.titel_preek: Schätze im Himmel, Schätze auf Erden

kernfrasen: Ihr könnt nicht Gott dienen und dem Kapital
Schätze auf Erden sind Dinge, Sachen, Besitztümer
unser Leben als einen Krieg zu begreifen
junge Mensch, den wir zum Töten abrichten
Ich gehe mit Bibeltexten... so um, dass ich dort anfange

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Schätze im Himmel sind Beziehungen, Austausch, Erfahrung miteinander

cognitieve_implicaties: Human connection has a 'value' that can be stored or lost.
theologische_implicaties: Salvation is communal rather than individualistic.
ethische_implicaties: Invest time in people rather than capital.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Could imply that 'good works' are a currency to buy heaven.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher redefines a dead biblical metaphor ('treasures in heaven') by mapping it onto modern sociological categories (Being vs. Having).

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses the 'Eye/Light' metaphor as a bridge between the 'Economic' and 'Military' domains, arguing that how we 'see' (epistemology) determines how we 'spend' (economy) and 'kill' (military).

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Light' of truth is blended with the 'Darkness' of nuclear strategy to show that even a 'dark' expert can inadvertently provide 'enlightenment' through honesty.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Eye' metaphor by linking it to modern media and political 'overlooking' of the poor.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Wenn das Auge ungeteilt sieht (auch die Unsichtbaren)...

risicos.beschrijving: The metaphor of 'War' for hunger might lead to a fatalistic view of history.
risicos.voorbeeld: unser Leben als einen Krieg zu begreifen
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may feel overwhelmed by the scale of global conflict.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A world of global economic struggle and nuclear threat.
sub_worlds: The world of the Mystics (internal light)
The world of the Sermon on the Mount (Jesus' original audience)
The world of the Military Advisor (Cold War strategy)

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By referencing the separation of light and darkness in Genesis.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the tension between the ECONOMIC and LIGHT domains. It successfully moves from abstract mysticism to concrete political economy by using the EYE as a cognitive pivot point. The military metaphors serve as the 'dark' contrast to the 'light' of the gospel.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Risk of being too 'mystical' or vague.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Link it more to physical 'seeing' of the neighbor's face.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The light is the reflection in the eyes of the hungry child.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly map 'Greed' as the 'Fuel' for the 'War Machine'.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: May imply that those in 'darkness' are blind/helpless rather than responsible.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To describe the 'building' of a new earth mentioned at the end.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful use of CMT to bridge the gap between ancient text and modern political reality.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just praising the 'beauty' of the light imagery, CMT reveals how 'light' functions as an epistemological tool for political resistance.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'learning styles' to show how the preacher restructures the hearer's conceptual world.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher's definition of 'Heaven' is not a location but a relational 'mode of being' (Target) mapped from 'Treasures' (Source).

appendices.notities: The sermon reflects the 1980s peace movement context in Germany.
